title: April
description: COUNT DOWN It's 1999.The overpopulation problem has been solved.On a planet decimated by a brutal plague. The number one pastime has been staying alive.The survivors -- teenagers -- thought they were the only people left on earth. But they are about to discover they're not alone.Something is watching them. Something ancient. Something evil. Something that has waited for centuries for its time to arrive....The wait is finally over.
author: Daniel Parker
